### class: [Plugin](https://github.com/berstend/puppeteer-extra/blob/a769d9e78174808c217a71dc5a2261129b5b9127/packages/puppeteer-extra-plugin-stealth/evasions/window.outerdimensions/index.js#L9-L40)

- `opts` (optional, default `{}`)

**Extends: PuppeteerExtraPlugin**

Fix missing window.outerWidth/window.outerHeight in headless mode
Will also set the viewport to match window size, unless specified by user
